Title: Theri
Writer: Atlee Kumar (story and screenplay), Ramanagirivasan (dialogue), Atlee Kumar (dialogue), Atlee Kumar
Actors: Joseph Vijay, Samantha Ruth Prabhu, Amy Jackson, Baby Nainika
Plot: When his daughter's life is endangered by a local gang, Joseph Kuruvilla will do whatever it takes to stop them. However, at the same time, his dangerous past slowly resurfaces.
